item.title: Trump pulls surgeon general nominee Janette Nesheiwat after questions about her medical education
item.description: Former Fox News medical contributor Dr. Janette Nesheiwat had been scheduled to appear Thursday for her confirmation hearing before a Senate committee...

item.title: Senate stablecoin vote outcome uncertain, after key Democrats back out
item.description: Senators face a key vote on a stablecoin regulation bill, but several Democrats who previously voted for the bill have backed out, putting its fate in...

item.title: EU to launch dispute against U.S. tariffs as it sets out 95 billion euros in countermeasures
item.description: The EU has paused an initial set of retaliatory measures — a response to U.S. duties of 25% on steel and aluminum — to enable negotiations.

item.title: Trump calls Fed Chair Jerome Powell a 'fool' after central bank keeps rates steady again
item.description: The Fed on Wednesday voted to keep its benchmark interest rate in a range of 4.25% to 4.5%, where it's kept it on hold since December.
